property.name: sun.cpu.isalist
property.value: pentium_pro+mmx pentium_pro pentium+mmx pentium i486 i386 i86

testcase.name: Then I should get result "updatefirstnew" in new stories list
Given I open the scrum tool add page
When I enter "title1" in the title textbox and I push the add button
Then I should get result "title1" in stories list
